name: Workshops
text: By organizing regular workshops, we ensure that your journey to becoming a skilled programmer is smooth and straightforward.

name: Codathons
text: We host codathons for all to test coding limits, improve skills, and advance careers in technology. Join us to enhance your coding journey!

name: Hackathons
text: A gathering for programmers and enthusiasts to create and showcase software, receiving feedback from experienced individuals.

name: Seminars
text: We organize seminars with industry experts to aid students in workplace readiness and skill enhancement for professional growth.
